info_popup_body.message: Not the page you expected? Learn more about how to restore Bookmarks and set your New Tab page.

searchinput_placeholder.message: Search the web to plant trees...

store_shortdesc_firefox.message: This extension sets your search engine to Ecosia so you can plant trees with every search.

store_shortdesc_new.message: This extension sets your search engine to Ecosia and customizes your new tab page so you can plant trees with every search.

store_shortdesc_old.message: This extension redirects your searches from the omnibar to Ecosia Search.

store_title_new.message: Ecosia - The search engine that plants trees
